question:
[Gene] went to his mother [Helen] ''s house to play cards. [Clyde], [Helen]'s other son, was there too. [Johnny] showed up later and asked his son [Gene] to deal him in too. [Florence] went to the mall, because she wanted to look for a present for her daughter, [Beverly]. [Janet] went shoe shopping with her sister [Beverly]. [Clyde] took his Aunt [Florence] out for her favorite meal
Question: How is [Janet] related to [Johnny]?
